FuncDef: The display mpls te tunnel traffic-statistics command displays tunnel traffic statistics.
CLIs: display mpls te tunnel traffic-statistics [ name <tunnel-name> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays statistics about traffic transmitted on a tunnel with a specified tunnel ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view tunnel traffic statistics, run the display mpls te tunnel traffic-statistics command.
